title: PPCs - Ashna and Luna - produce food and machines

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Using equal amounts of resources, the countries of Ashna and Luna can each produce any combination of food and machines described by their production possibilities curves above.

Which country has an absolute advantage in the production of machines? Explain.

Which country has an absolute advantage in the production of food? Explain.

Which country has a comparative advantage in the production of machines? Explain.

With trade between these two countries, which country will import food? Explain.

Give an example of terms of trade acceptable to both countries.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.
